text: Excited to see the innovative work of Eduardo Iglesias and VivaWell! By prioritizing illness prevention in their healthcare plans, they're not only improving employee health but also creating a ripple effect that boosts productivity and reduces costs for Latin American corporations. Embracing prevention-centered approaches is a giant leap towards a more sustainable and equitable future in healthcare.
